item.description:
• How strongly do you believe in your capacity to heal and create?
  • What if you had the scientific basis to not only explain “miracle cures”, but the means to also deliberately initiate them?

    “The Living Matrix – The New Science of Healing” reveals that energy and "information fields", not genetics, drives human physiology!

    If you feel like you’d like to strengthen your beliefs in being an energetic, spiritual being and in the law of attraction, we encourage you to see this movie.

    You will hear scientists, psychologists, bioenergetic researchers and holistic practitioners who have discovered and proven that we are far more than biochemical machines. You’ll also hear real people tell their stories of making remarkable recoveries with energetic “information-based” therapies. All presented in an easy-to-understand way.

    This information has profound implications which support Law of Attraction principles. We found it to be totally inspiring and belief affirming. If we have the power to heal our bodies with the right beliefs and thoughts, then we can apply that power and capability to other desires, too!

    If you practice or have had positive experiences with any kind of alternative healing therapy, please come and join us to share your experience with us and inspire us even further.

    The movie is 83 minutes long; so please arrive on time, as it will be important for us to start promptly. We encourage you to linger afterwards to socialize, etc.

    Thank you so much to those of you who have RSVP'd "yes" and showed up! PLEASE, PLEASE, only sign up if you really intend to show up. We set up our space, and prepare snacks and handouts accordingly. Also, we can only take a maximum of 20 people in our space, and do not want to exclude anyone unnecessarily because of a no-show. Help us reach our goal of 100% attendance for those who rsvp "yes"!

    There's nothing better than feeling good and having fun! Please join us and stay "connected" by participating in our community's message board discussions and receiving our e-mails (which will include our "Good Vibrations" tips and news). To be able to do so, go to your account, and under "Your Groups", each one has an "Edit email settings". Set your preferences there. Hope to hear from you!

    Eagerly looking forward to co-creating with you!

    Ann and Mark
item.how_to_find_us: We're down a very long driveway, with mailbox at street end. Please check files for further important instructions.

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Movie night! The Living Matrix
